dcterms:description: The EMOTIC dataset is designed for Context-Aware Emotion Recognition (CAER), containing images with annotated emotional states based on contextual and environmental factors.
dcterms:title: EMOTIC

dcterms:description: The HECO dataset consists of images annotated with emotional states for multiple context awareness, facilitating emotion recognition in various scenarios.
dcterms:title: HECO
